intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create a new domain model using the Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF) Ecore metamodel.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Launch the domain model wizard
item.description:
To open the Domain Model wizard, go to File > New... > Domain-Specific Language > Domain Model.
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.

item.title: Model domain elements
item.description: Using the diagram surface and tools in the palette, create class, operation, attributes, annotations, and relationships.
